630:1: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-iha khalu suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kvaciddharme carati |
630:10: nāpi viparyāse vā abhūte vā caran bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
630:17: ye ca na tathā yathā gṛhītāḥ,
630:19: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse vā abhūte vā carati |
630:25: sā na śakyā ādarśayitum-iyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryā,
630:30: sarvacaryāvinivṛttaye hi bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti pṛthagjanacaryāvinivṛttaye śrāvakacaryāvinivṛtaye pratyekabuddhacaryāvinivṛttaye |
630:32: teṣvapi bodhisattvā na caranti nābhiniviśante-ime vā te bodhisattvadharmāḥ,
630:45: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmaḥ kalpo vā vikalpo vā |
630:50: yo naiva ante na anante carati,
630:52: madhyamapi suvikrāntavikrāmin samanupaśyan madhye caran anta eva carati |
630:53: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin madhyasya kāciccaryā (vā kiṃci)
630:56: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitaḥ,
630:58: api tu yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
630:60: sa sarvadharmān na bhāvayanna vibhāvayan bhāvanāsamatikrānto dharmasamatāmanuprāpnoti,
630:65: vibhāvito hi sa mārgo na bhāvito na vibhāvitaḥ |
630:71: sacetkhalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bhāvanā syādvibhāvanā vā,
630:74: vibhāvaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin vigatā asyāṃ bhāvaneti vibhāvanā,
630:82: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāso viparyāsaṃ samutthāpayati |
630:99: sarvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin caryā sā caryāsamutthānā |
630:106: acaryeti suvikrāntavikrāmin yanna kvaciddharme carati na vicarati na caryālakṣaṇaṃ saṃdarśayati,
630:110: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
630:117: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścakṣurārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
630:124: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:132: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāmarūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:142: parijñātā hi taiḥ sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca-abhūtaiṣā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ceti |
630:143: yaiśca abhūtā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca jñātā,
630:148: ye na suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ vā poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavotthāpakasamutthāpakakārakakārayitṛvedakavedayitṛsaṃjñāyāṃ jñātṛjñāpakasaṃjñāyāṃ carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti |
630:154: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā viparyāsairvā dṛṣṭigatairvā nīvaraṇairvā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:160: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:164: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca,
630:167: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:174: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:180: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:186: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:192: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:198: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:205: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:211: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:217: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:223: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:229: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:235: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
630:241: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām,
630:256: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati |
630:263: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
630:269: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:274: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:279: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:284: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati |
630:289: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati |
630:294: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:297: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:300: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:303: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:306: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:309: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati|
630:312: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:315: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:318: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
630:325: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ||
630:326: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
630:330: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
630:340: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
630:345: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti carati,
630:364: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati,
630:390: sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni |
630:395: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante,
630:398: te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti,
630:400: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ||
630:401: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati,
630:416: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
630:418: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat-acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā |
630:460: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā,
630:464: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā |
630:468: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti |
630:508: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati |
630:514: tatra bodhisattvo'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate ?
630:517: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati |
630:518: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham |
630:519: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati |
630:523: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
630:531: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate-ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,
630:533: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
630:534: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
630:535: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
630:536: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
630:537: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā punaḥ kaiścinnimittacaritairupalambhacaritairātmadṛṣṭibhiḥ sattvadṛṣṭibhirjīvadṛṣṭibhiḥ pudgaladṛṣṭibhirbhavadṛṣṭibhirvibhavadṛṣṭibhirucchedadṛṣṭibhiḥ śāścatadṛṣṭibhiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭibhiḥ skandhadṛṣṭibhirdhātudṛṣṭibhirāyatanadṛṣṭibhirbuddhadṛṣṭibhirdharmadṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃghadṛṣṭibhirnirvāṇadṛṣṭibhiḥ prāptasaṃprajñairvā adhimānikairvā rāgadveṣamohacaritairvā viparyāsacaritairvā utpathonmārgaprasthitairvā anākramaṇīyā |
630:538: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā ||
630:539: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat |
630:540: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,
630:546: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat,
630:547: na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro'bhaviṣyat-śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā veti |
630:550: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,
630:551: tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,
630:555: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
630:556: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena |
630:557: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,
630:564: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti |
630:565: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena |
630:566: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam ||
630:567: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,
630:570: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:577: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:578: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:579: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:583: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:588: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:590: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:591: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na bodhisattvadharmabuddhadharmān)
630:593: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
630:629: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca |
630:635: yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
630:637: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati ||
630:638: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate |
630:664: so'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā |
630:669: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati |
630:670: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti, nopādatte |
630:671: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
630:674: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti, nopādatte |
630:686: nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte |
630:697: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ |
630:709: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya |
630:712: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte,
630:715: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
630:716: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati ||
630:717: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
630:719: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu |
630:720: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate |
630:723: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
630:730: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye,
630:732: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
630:741: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
630:749: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate-yadatītaṃ tacchūnyam,
630:752: anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate-yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti |
630:754: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate-yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti |
630:756: atītaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
630:758: anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
630:760: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti,
630:762: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati|
630:763: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate |
630:766: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate,
630:767: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
630:810: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta |
630:829: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate |
630:831: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate |
630:832: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati,
630:834: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
630:835: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati |
630:836: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum,
630:840: na cāsya te'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ,
630:848: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām |
630:849: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām |
630:851: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati |
630:876: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati |
630:877: na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati |
630:882: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati |
630:899: , tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā |
630:900: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati |
630:904: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na vikalpanā,
630:908: anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ |
630:920: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
630:923: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati |
630:926: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati |
630:931: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca|
630:967: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo'dhigantum ||
630:968: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati |
630:990: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati-atikrāntaviṣayo'yaṃ mama,
630:996: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate-alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti |
630:999: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
630:1003: mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā mahāśokaśalyaviddhāḥ-ativāhayiṣyatyayaṃ bata sattvānasmadviṣayāt,
630:1013: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ |
630:1014: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)
630:1016: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ |
630:1021: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti-kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
630:1024: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
630:1026: na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā |
630:1029: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ |
630:1036: na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum,
630:1043: te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ |
630:1044: te'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum |
630:1046: tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati |
630:1047: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati |
630:1048: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum |
630:1053: ye'pi tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
630:1055: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu sadevanikāyeṣu,
630:1059: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau |
630:1060: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena |
630:1061: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
630:1063: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,
630:1067: niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
630:1070: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca)
630:1071: bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā bhavanti,
630:1073: ye'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,
630:1078: ye vā punaranye'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ |
630:1079: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti,
630:1081: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,
630:1118: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati,
630:1124: asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate,
630:1126: sarvaniśrayānamanyamāno'nupalabhamāno'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati |
630:1128: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
